global.name: ExtFunctions
global.value: {('http://exslt.org/common', 'node-set'): <function NodeSet>, ('http://exslt.org/common', 'object-type'): <function ObjectType>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'add'): <function Add>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'add-duration'): <function AddDuration>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'date'): <function Date>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'date-time'): <function DateTime>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'day-abbreviation'): <function DayAbbreviation>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'day-in-month'): <function DayInMonth>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'day-in-week'): <function DayInWeek>, ('http://exslt.org/dates-and-times', 'day-in-year'): <function DayInYear>, ...}
